custom-sql.sql: SELECT count(*) FROM KBArticle INNER JOIN KBFolder ON (KBArticle.kbFolderId = KBFolder.kbFolderId AND KBArticle.groupId = KBFolder.groupId) WHERE KBArticle.groupId = ? AND KBArticle.urlTitle = ? AND KBFolder.urlTitle = ? AND KBArticle.status IN ([$WORKFLOW_STATUS$])
